description: A Japanese influenced dish with smoky and sweet flavours that really bring out the flavour of the beef.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Dairy free
name: Beef Yakitori Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan on a medium heat, fry all of the sauce/marinade ingredients for 20 minutes until the sauce reduces by half.
Once the sauce has thickened, remove from the heat and separate into 2 bowls. 1 is for marinating the skewers and the other is for serving as a dip.
Add beef chunks onto skewers. Heat up a chargrill to a medium heat. Drizzle the beef with canola oil before grilling.
Fry the beef skewers on the chargrill for 5 minutes while rotating. Baste the beef with the marinade while cooking and rotate.
Repeat the basting process about 3 to 4 times until the beef is cooked fully though. Serve the skewers with the extra dipping sauce on the side and a choice of condiments.
